testcase.name: Add a Product to Cart and payment
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Plum Goodness website.....................................passed When I search for the product "palm"........................................passed And I click on the product..................................................passed And I add the product to the cart using JavaScript..........................passed And I click on the cart button..............................................passed And I click on "View cart"..................................................passed Then I should be in the shopping cart page..................................passed

testcase.name: User logout
